a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average age of women at marriage
Data source: UN World Marriage Data (2019) and OECD (2017)
Note: For OECD countries figures correspond to mean age at first marriage. For other countries, figures correspond to singulate mean age at
marriage, which is an indirect estimate of mean age at first marriage.
